title: Riot really doesn't want "lame" champs like maokai and gragas seen at worlds
body:
Gragas
Drunken Rage (W) [ 8% down from 8/9/10/11/12% targets max hp]

Maokai
Vengeful Maelstrom (R) cooldown increased to 60/50/40 from 40/30/20



Riot destroys 2 completely balanced champs again. 

Meanwhile {{champion:1}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:39}} are still not nerfed and {{champion:64}} {{champion:238}}  even recieve buffs. 
what a joke from the side of riot.

EDIT: They will buff maokai and gragas and nerf lee after worlds 100% and say an excuse like "we overdid it a bit on gragas and maokai..." typical riot.

replies.body:
Gragas balanced?

Maokai Balance?

Since when?
>implying gragas and maokai aren't still broken hitler spawn

Nothing really lame about champions that shine mostly in teamfights because of their kits.

and balanced? have you ever vs'd a maokai that beat your top laner? or a gragas that's beating your jungle? they are pretty oppressive at times.

> [{quoted}](name=SwapShadows,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ktXTraXn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:33:51.921+0000)
>
> Not really, gragas and maokai both make big plays and are huge in teamfights.
> 
> and balanced? have you ever vs'd a maokai that beat your top laner? or a gragas that's beating your jungle?

The tank meta is over now anyways. They arent evne strong

it wasn't even a tank a meta just tanks were finally viable again, cause if this is what you considered a tank meta you really dont know what that is i mean the only time this could even really maybe considered tank meta was around the time of cinderhulk release when it was way to good

> [{quoted}](name=SwapShadows,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ktXTraXn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:33:51.921+0000)
>
> Not really, gragas and maokai both make big plays and are huge in teamfights.
> 
> and balanced? have you ever vs'd a maokai that beat your top laner? or a gragas that's beating your jungle?

maokai is terrible in laning phase since his passive nerf. Juggernaut now counter him like garen who takes 1/2 of his hp with ulti.
additionaly many items of maokai were nerfed in this patch
So you're saying they are strong when fed?

> [{quoted}](name=kile147,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ktXTraXn,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2015-08-20T23:24:03.411+0000)
>
> So you're saying they are strong when fed?

No there's a difference, when someone like Zac or something gets fed they don't automatically shut down your carries chances of actually being able to do something in a teamfight. Gragas and maokai will completely destroy teamfights if even ahead and if behind they are still useful.

I'm not saying they are op at all, just pretty strong in terms of usefulness and teamfighting.

Sorry, but while Gragas is balanced, Maokai isn't really. (He's the best top lane tank in the entire game, and he kinda forces out most other top lane tanks other than Shen who is based 100% on his ultimate.)

Irelia and Annie don't need nerfs. The Zed buff was tolerable.

The Lee buffs and the lack of Vayne nerfs are hauntingly bad decisions, but that means that you are swinging something like 3/8 out of your complaints which means I don't think that you know what you're talking about.

I actually have never really hated Gragas even before multiple other nerfs he has received in the past, playing with or against him. He hasn't really ever been toxic and he has clear weaknesses. I also like how playing AP Gragas or playing Tank Gragas can work so he's not just shoved into one role/build like other champions. He's probably one of the last tanks I would want nerfed.

The thing I don't like about Maokai is how easy it is for him to initiate teamfights, follow-up on ganks, and he doesn't really have a really weak spot to the game. If he's ahead he's really annoying to deal with, if he's behind he's still extremely strong since he has more than enough utility. At every stage of the game he can be strong and even when the Maokai plays bad and doesn't do great he's still a huge threat and very relevant.

Thus my point that Gragas is fine and Maokai is pushing other top lane tanks out of play. His entire kit allows him to work without having as much gold as other tanks because of the raw amount of disruption and tankiness that it brings to the table.

He gets AoE damage mitigation from his ultimate, a slow, a knock up/back, and a point and click snare. His amount of CC is insane, and combined with his relatively high damage for a tank, easy laning, and remarkable variety of build paths... He needs a nerf to let other top lane tanks shine through.
Vayne overpowered? Zed overpowered? Maokai balanced? I am sorry, but I thought we were talking about LCS, not your average SoloQ game.

Because Gragas and Maokai aren't broken as hell or anything.  Right.

Mind you I frickin' hate Zed/Lee, but my god if you deny how OP those two champs have been you're delusional.
Going for that Lee Sin 100% pick rate

Maokai rushes Righteous Glory first item and can still very easily outduel the enemy top laner.  Gragas can 100-0 a squishy in less than 3 seconds with nothing but a Cinderhulk. Tell me more about how balanced Maokai and Gragas are.

Balanced champs? lmfao Maokai has been a top pick since Season 4 worlds 

The stupidity on this forum I swear

i've seen about 2 maokai in like 100 games and maybe 5-10 gragas

these were normal games, but "OP' champs tend to show up more because they aren't banned and allow practice
MAOKAI BALANCED LOL
Like every year. Typical Rito.
They nerf his W and don't buff anything poor Gragy

Patch 5.17 be like:
"Lee Sin & Zed are currently disabled for receiving huge buffs that might destroy our servers, instead, they're only available at Worlds for LC$BiGPLAY$.
Both should be back throughout the next patch"

The dream {{item:3070}}

lol what. gragas has been consistently strong for i dont know how long and maokai as well, he has ridiculous damage even when building full tank, not saying they're op but yeah your argument doesn't hold up, at all. just another sheep postin  on the boards for upvotes lol

solution 
part 1: do not go to lcs.
part 2: do not buy more rp.
part 3: refuse to pick lcs meta champs.
part 4: ban lcs meta champs 10/10

> [{quoted}](name=ihaveapotion,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ktXTraXn,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-08-21T02:17:25.741+0000)
>
> solution 
> part 1: do not go to lcs.
> part 2: do not buy more rp.
> part 3: refuse to pick lcs meta champs.
> part 4: ban lcs meta champs 10/10

Part 5: Quit the game.
juggernauts will be gutted 100% next patch

What makes you think Riot doesn't want them at worlds?

They have both been at the forefront of Worlds play before.
I'm not sure if im correct on this because I didnt follow lcs very hard last year, but wasn't Maokai like a top pick?

What the hell is balanced about a 15 second ultimate? {{champion:57}} could be built tanky and still do impressive damage and CC. Gragas I have much less of an issue with but his ultimate is one of the strongest engage/ disengage when used properly.

All I see is Mao top now in LCS.
Thresh/Janna/Ali supp
Why did you use lane in quotes?
Maokai has been strong since late season 4 and gragas has been strong most of season 5. ???????
